text: the world number one tennis star novak
djokovic says he will go to australia
this month to defend his open title the
serbian star who has spoken out about
coronavirus vaccines received a medical
exemption from having a covet-19 vaccine
australia has strict covert rules and
there had been doubts about whether
djokovic would take part in the
tournament
well our tennis correspondent russell
fuller is following developments for us
one possibility that i think is a real
one given that the overcrown variant is
so widespread around the world now is
that he has recently tested positive for
cobit djokovic had covered for the first
time around about 18 months ago but if
he had tested positive at any point in
fact in the last six months that enables
you to defer your vaccination and to
enter australia without having the
vaccination proof other reasons include
inflammatory cardiac illness or an acute
major medical condition now it would
seem unlikely that djokovic was
suffering from either of those but we
are none the wiser until unless he
himself decides to tell us
russell
